context.name: Umarex Ruger 10/22 CO2 .177 Air Rifle
context.excerpt: The Umarex Ruger 10/22 CO2 .177 Air Rifle not only has the looks of the famous original, but it also shares the excellent handling characteristics.
context.content:
The Ruger .22lr 10/22 has been a top seller since the 1960s, balanced, robust and precision-built. The Umarex Ruger 10/22 CO2 .177 Air Rifle also has what it takes to become a classic.

This Air Rifle not only has the looks of the famous original, but it also shares the excellent handling characteristics.

Umarex Ruger 10/22 CO2 .177 Air Rifle Features

Powered by two 12-gram CO2 cartridges (CO2 NOT included)
Afermarket 10/22 rail can be easily added for mounting optics
Shoots .177 caliber pellets at up to 700 fps
Single or double action shooting; Includes a drop-out 10-shot pellet magazine
Features authentic style flip-up rear sight, adjustable for elevation, and a fixed front bead sight
